Subject: ADV-2024-002
Description: I am reaching out in regards to the ADV-2024-002 vulnerability that has recently been discovered. I am curious to know if the client version 6.0.1.6 is affected by this vulnerability. Additionally - I updated the EPP server using the live update feature for the EPP Server Hotfix #1.1, and I can see that the update has applied. The only issue is that I still see this security update available underneath the "available EPP software updates" section. I'd like to confirm if the update applied to the server.
Solution_Comment__c: Assisted the customer with applying the hotfix containing the agents
